item.title: TEST POST NO.1
item.description: TEST POST NO.1 Here is a regular “blog post” type page. It has type = “post” defined in the front-matter. The template being used to display this post on its own like this is in: /themes/skeletontheme/layouts/_default/single.html As we want to keep blog posts as a separate section, we put the markdown file in a subfolder: /content/blog/ Note: use hugo new /blog/.md to create new posts in this directory Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
